entry.title: Install Xilinx ISE on the Ubuntu
entry.content:
Download Xilinx ISE

Official site: http://www.xilinx.com/support/download/index.htm

Choose Full Installer for Linux

Install

bash Install cd the folder untar the archives sudo chmod +x xsetup sudo ./xsetup 1. Just use the default install path: /opt/Xilinx 2. Uncheck Install cable drivers(if checked, it will pop the error info below, just click OK.

bash Xilinx Software Steup Driver installation failed. Please check the /.xinstall/install.log file for ... 3. The Xilinx License Configuration Manager appears 4. Finish
